commInfra

Class MemObject<R>

  • java.lang.Object
    • commInfra.MemObject<R>
  • Type Parameters:
    R - data type of stored objects
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    MemFIFO

    public abstract class MemObject<R>
extends java.lang.Object
    Parametric memory. Non-instantiatable data type. It must be derived. Errors are reported.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      protected R[] mem
      Internal storage area.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Modifier Constructor and Description
      protected MemObject(R[] storage)
      Memory instantiation.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      protected abstract R read()
      Memory read.
      protected abstract void write(R val)
      Memory write.

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • Field Detail

      • mem

        protected R[] mem
        Internal storage area.

    • Constructor Detail

      • MemObject

        protected MemObject(R[] storage)
             throws MemException
        Memory instantiation. The instantiation only takes place if the memory exists.
        Parameters:
        storage - memory to be used
        Throws:
        MemException - when the memory does not exist

    • Method Detail

      • write

        protected abstract void write(R val)
                       throws MemException
        Memory write. A parametric object is written into it. Virtual method, it has to be overridden in a derived data type.
        Parameters:
        val - parametric object to be written
        Throws:
        MemException - when the memory is full

      • read

        protected abstract R read()
                   throws MemException
        Memory read. A parametric object is read from it. Virtual method, it has to be overridden in a derived data type.
        Returns:
        last parametric object that was written
        Throws:
        MemException - when the memory is empty
